name: CustomerSubType
comment: Maintains a valid list of values that are used to further classify customer types.Examples of Customer Sub Types include:   * For Customer Type:Residential following are the customer subs types:   I - Individual   E-Employee  P-Pensioner* For Customer Type: Business following are the customer subs types:   S - SOHO   M-Micro   D-Medium
vf short description: Maintains a valid list of values that are used to further classify customer types.

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: CustomerSubTypeKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the customer sub type in ALDM. Each Customer Key value represents a unique customer sub type. Generated Key based on Customer Type Id and  Customer Sub Type Id

fields.name: CustomerSubTypeShortDesc
fields.comment: Short description of customer subtype, e.g. SN (means SME Netzbetreiber)

fields.name: CustomerSubTypeDesc
fields.comment: Describes the customer subtype. For example, Small and Medium Business. Short Description

fields.name: CustomerSubTypeId
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the customer sub type in the source system. Customer Sub Type

fields.name: CustomerTypeId
fields.comment: Identifies the customer type in the source system.For example:- E - Enterprise- C - Consumer Customer Type

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
